analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x588047365df5ba589f923604aac23d673555c623.sol:
	Contract NaviToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x588047365df5ba589f923604aac23d673555c623.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
